name: @outburn/structure-navigator
description: Navigate and resolve FHIR element definitions using FSH-like paths
author: Outburn Ltd.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && ncc build src/index.ts --external fhir-snapshot-generator --minify --no-cache --out dist
scripts.dist-to-module: npm run build && rimraf node_modules/@outburn && node test/dist-to-module.js
scripts.debug:build: npm run dist-to-module && ncc build test/debug.ts --external fhir-snapshot-generator --no-cache --out test/dist/debug && node test/dist/debug/index.js
